messages.content: You do not have to choose between the lesser of two evils. Put the people's voice back into politics and vote UKIP in June!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fully restoring the legal supremacy of the British Parliament. Controlling and planning immigration to what the UK needs. Support adequate housing, hospital and school spaces.
Restoring our full maritime sovereignty and taking control of our maritime exclusive economic zone (fishing waters).
Retaking our seat in the World Trade Organisation (WTO) and regaining our sovereign right to freely trade with other countries.

mentions.tacticalSituation: You do not have to choose between the lesser of two evils. Put the people's voice back into politics and vote UKIP in June!

issues.brexitEurope: Fully restoring the legal supremacy of the British Parliament. No settlement or ongoing payments to the EU budget.
issues.immigration: Controlling and planning immigration to what the UK needs.

community.content: Supporting the growth of small businesses through reduced business rates, tackling 'late-payers', and further opportunities for apprenticeships.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, The time has come to stop wasting your vote on the two traditional mainstream parties...

contactInformation.address: Maurice Jackson, 11 Ansdell Drive, Droylsden, Manchester M43 6NG

examples: You do not have to choose between the lesser of two evils. Put the people's voice back into politics and vote UKIP in June!
Supporting the growth of small businesses through reduced business rates, tackling 'late-payers', and further opportunities for apprenticeships.
Using Brownfield sites for new housing.
Reducing Council Tax and cutting down on unnecessary spending by the Council.
Fully restoring the legal supremacy of the British Parliament.
Restoring our full maritime sovereignty and taking control of our maritime exclusive economic zone (fishing waters).
Retaking our seat in the World Trade Organisation (WTO) and regaining our sovereign right to freely trade with other countries.

personalStories.story: Dear Voter, The time has come to stop wasting your vote on the two traditional mainstream parties...
personalStories.issueRelated: You do not have to choose between the lesser of two evils.

examples: An ineffective leader whose outdated ideology even his own parliamentary party derides.
A party which leaves us over-taxed and with an increasingly uncertain and risky position in a post-Brexit world.

The mainstream political parties have consistently failed our country through excessive borrowing, radical austerity measures, privatisation of the NHS through PFI contracts, and giving tax breaks to the richest.
An ineffective leader whose outdated ideology even his own parliamentary party derides.
